类型: Color: Black Frame Grey Lens+tortoise Frame Clear LensLens Width: 54 Millimeters
评论详情: I saw an influencer in these and they looked so fun and cute on her so I wanted to try them. Granted we have very different features, I have a higher nose bridge and her's is lower which usually means glasses just look cuter on her face. I thought well maybe these would work! I was sadly mistaken. They aren't horrible but I do look like a professor in Harry Potter when I was going for a Bella Hadid type look.  This is not to say you couldn't rock these but maybe someone with a larger nose it might look a little strange. Maybe its just me! I do think they are a cute style with the brown clear look and it also came with a black sunglass pair which I can sort of get away with the style a little better. I will say they are not the clearest glasses. I have to wear prescription eyewear to see far away but somehow when I put these on they make my regular eye sight just a tad bit more blurry. Not by a lot but I think cheaper lenses will do that when you're use to wearing expensive lenses. I am still going to try to rock these and see where that takes me.
